title: Community Ecology
description: An advanced ecology course that covers classic and contemporary concepts, patterns, and processes in the field of community ecology
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 2335 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or BIOL 2337 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or BIOS 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or BIOS 2310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
